de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization

Class InverseDocumentFrequencyNormalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.AbstractConversionFilter<O,O>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.AbstractNormalization<SparseFloatVector>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.InverseDocumentFrequencyNormalization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Normalization<SparseFloatVector>, ObjectFilter, InspectionUtilFrequentlyScanned, Parameterizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TFIDFNormalization

    public class InverseDocumentFrequencyNormalization
extends AbstractNormalization<SparseFloatVector>
    Normalization for text frequency vectors, using the inverse document frequency.
